name: Roll Home
description:
Roll home is a playful puzzle game about rolling around odd shapes. You play as a building in the making collecting friends to become a home. 

This project was developed in Unity over the course of 48 hours.

CREDITS:
Duncan Corrigan (Art/Design/Level Design)
Wayne Petzler (Programming/Design)
Kaveh Tabar (Art/Animation)
Ben Taylor (Programming/Music/Design)
